whatIs.title: What is Dr3amToReal?
whatIs.paragraph1: Dr3amToReal is a design-led 3D printing studio based in Portugal, creating custom parts, original objects, and personalised prints.
whatIs.paragraph3: Every piece is designed, tested, and refined before it's made available.
whatIs.paragraph4: Some designs start as functional solutions — others as creative experiments — but all of them are built with the same attention to detail.

column1.title: Functional & Replacement Parts
column1.description: Custom or hard-to-find components, especially for older or discontinued models.

column2.title: Home Décor & Everyday Objects
column2.description: Original designs created to be both useful and visually meaningful.

column3.title: Personalised Prints
column3.description: Objects adapted to your taste, size, or use case — no generic solutions.

whyExists.title: Why Dr3amToReal Exists
whyExists.paragraph1: Dr3amToReal started with a simple frustration: needing a part that no longer existed.
whyExists.paragraph2: That frustration turned into designing replacements, improving them, and eventually creating entirely new objects — first for old cars, then for everyday life.
whyExists.paragraph3: Backed by years of experience in quality engineering and testing, this studio applies the same mindset to physical objects:

customWork.title: Have an Idea That Doesn't Exist Yet?
customWork.description: Some projects don't belong in a catalogue.
customWork.paragraph: If you have an idea, a problem to solve, or an object you want adapted to your needs, Dr3amToReal offers select custom design and 3D printing services.
customWork.paragraph2: Custom work is collaborative, intentional, and quoted based on complexity — not rushed or automated.
customWork.cta_note: Please include as much detail as possible for a meaningful response.

manifesto.title: What This Studio Believes In
manifesto.point1: Objects should exist for a reason
manifesto.point2: Quality comes from iteration, not speed
manifesto.point5: Well-made things are meant to last

founderNote.title: From the Founder
founderNote.paragraph1: Dr3amToReal began as a personal dream.
founderNote.paragraph2: After years working in quality engineering — testing systems before they reached people — I found myself applying the same discipline to physical creation.
founderNote.paragraph3: Designing, testing, refining, and improving objects until they feel right.
founderNote.paragraph4: This studio is my way of combining engineering precision with creativity — and sharing that process with others who care about how things are made.
founderNote.paragraph5: Thank you for being here at the very beginning.

locationShipping.title: Based in Portugal, Shipping Worldwide
locationShipping.paragraph1: Dr3amToReal is proudly based in Portugal.
locationShipping.paragraph2: Orders are produced locally and shipped with care.
locationShipping.paragraph3: Availability and shipping options depend on the product and destination and are confirmed during checkout.

finalCta.title: Every Object Starts as an Idea
finalCta.description: Whether you're looking for a finished design or want to bring something new to life, Dr3amToReal exists to turn ideas into real, well-made objects.

seo.description: Dr3amToReal is a design-led 3D printing studio based in Portugal, creating custom parts, original designs, and personalised objects with care.
seo.og_title: About Dr3amToReal | Design-Led 3D Printing Studio in Portugal
seo.og_description: Dr3amToReal is a design-led 3D printing studio based in Portugal, creating custom parts, original designs, and personalised objects with care.

intro.title: About Dr3amToReal
intro.paragraph1: Dr3amToReal is a creative 3D-printing studio based in Portugal, focused on custom parts, original designs, and personalised objects — from functional components to decorative pieces.
intro.paragraph2: This brand started as a dream: the desire to design the right object, print it properly, test it thoroughly, and make it available for others who care about quality and detail as much as I do.
intro.paragraph3: Behind Dr3amToReal is PompousWeek Unipessoal Lda, a company originally founded around Quality Assurance, engineering services, and training. Quality has always been the foundation — and it naturally carried over into physical creation.
intro.paragraph4: What began with a love for old cars and hard-to-find replacement parts quickly grew into something broader: a space to design and produce objects that are functional, beautiful, and personal.

whatICreate.title: What I create
whatICreate.item1: Custom and replacement parts, especially for older or discontinued models
whatICreate.item2: Home décor and functional objects, designed in-house
whatICreate.item3: Personalised prints, adapted to your taste, dimensions, or use case
whatICreate.item4: Small-batch and one-off pieces — not mass production
whatICreate.note: Every design goes through iteration, testing, and refinement before it's offered for sale.

howDifferent.title: How this is different
howDifferent.description: Dr3amToReal is not a print farm.
howDifferent.subtitle: It's a design-first, quality-driven studio, where:
howDifferent.point2: prints are tested, adjusted, and improved
howDifferent.point3: and customers can collaborate instead of just "ordering a file"
howDifferent.note: Some pieces are available as finished prints. Others are created together with you.

whereGoing.title: Where this is going
whereGoing.paragraph: Dr3amToReal is growing step by step — expanding its design catalogue, refining production, and exploring new materials and techniques — always with the same goal:
whereGoing.goal: Turn ideas, memories, and needs into well-made objects that last.

signature.line1: Designed with care. Printed with intention.

hero.title: FAQ – Dr3amToReal
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Dr3amToReal

section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
section.description: Everything you need to know about Dr3amToReal

q1.question: Is Dr3amToReal a new business?
q1.answer:
Yes. Dr3amToReal is a young brand, currently growing under PompousWeek Unipessoal Lda, a Portuguese company.

While the 3D-printing studio is new, it builds on years of experience in engineering, testing, and quality-focused work.

q2.question: Do you only sell what's in the shop?
q2.answer:
Not always.

Some designs are available as ready-to-order prints, but custom requests and personalisation are a big part of what I do.

If you have:
• a part that's hard to find
• an idea you want to bring to life
• or an object you'd like adapted

You can contact me to discuss feasibility.

q3.question: Can you design a custom part for me?
q3.answer:
Yes — depending on complexity, purpose, and timeframe.

Custom design work may include:
• measurements or reference photos
• iteration and testing
• material selection guidance

Not every request will be a fit, but I'm always happy to explore possibilities.

q4.question: Do you sell digital files (STL)?
q4.answer:
At the moment, Dr3amToReal focuses primarily on printed objects.

Digital files may be offered in the future for selected designs, but the priority right now is delivering tested, physical results.

q5.question: What materials do you use?
q5.answer:
Material choice depends on the object's purpose.

This can include:
• durable functional plastics
• materials suitable for decorative or indoor use
• finishes chosen for strength, feel, or aesthetics

If you're ordering a custom piece, material options will be discussed with you.

q6.question: Are these mass-produced items?
q6.answer:
No.

Most pieces are:
• made to order
• produced in small batches
• or created as one-offs

This allows for better quality control and personalisation.

q7.question: Where are you based? Do you ship internationally?
q7.answer:
Dr3amToReal is based in Portugal.

International shipping may be available depending on the product and destination.

Details are confirmed at order time.

q8.question: I have an idea but don't know if it's possible. What should I do?
q8.answer:
That's perfectly fine — many projects start that way.

You can get in touch with:
• a description of the idea
• photos, sketches, or references (if available)
• what you want the object to do

We'll take it from there.
